code: import axios from'axios';import queryString from'query-string';import apiConfig from'./apiConfig';const axiosClient=axios.create({baseURL:apiConfig.baseUrl,headers:{'Content-Type':'application/json'},paramsSerializer:params=>queryString.stringify({...params,api_key:apiConfig.apiKey})});axiosClient.interceptors.request.use(async config=>config);axiosClient.interceptors.response.use(response=>{if(response&&response.data){return response.data;}return response;},error=>{throw error;});export default axiosClient;
